replies.author: BlackJocker
replies.txt_content:
这行应该是有插件和ProtocolLib不兼容的报错
com.comphenix.protocol.reflect.FieldAccessException: Field index must be within 0 - count
我觉得最有可能导致报错的是SpawnHub 直接每次有玩家登入都报错
us.tryy3.spawnhub.main.teleport(main.java81)
us.tryy3.spawnhub.main.onJoin(main.java:40)
（不是的话请无视
